outputs.output_descr: The project will initially support the governments of Ethiopia, Ghana, Kenya and Senegal to draw up MDG- based poverty reduction strategy papers (PRSPs). The countries were chosen based on several criteria; first, they face severe challenges in their efforts to meet the MDGs; second, the state of governance in them is fairly good; and third, their governments have expressed explicit commitment to undertaking MDG - based planning. In this connection, it will  first contribute to helping the Governments conduct a detailed MDG needs assessments in collaboration with the UN Country Team, donors and civil society in each pilot country, followed by  a process of realigning their PRSPs to MDGs in the context of longer-term planning frameworks.

project_title: RAF04009Support to MDG-based Planning for PRSPs - Africa
